title: Raw (and graded) T206 FS contd -- downsizing the Monster (LETTER C)
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: Raw (and graded) T206 FS contd -- downsizing the Monster (LETTER C)
posts.post_content:
In the first thread of this series, I mentioned how, after achieving a Monster Number of over 500, I've decided to downsize my T206 collection to focus on tough backs (of which I have many), Cubs and White Sox (of which I have both team sets), top-tier HOFers, and a few nice cards that I just like. I'm selling the rest, starting with the letter A in that first post:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=285881[/url]

I posted cards starting with B in a separate post the other day, and now I'm adding new cards starting with letter C in this post. Prices are listed after each picture, PayPal F&F preferred. PM me if interested. Please add $3 for shipping for any number of cards up to $100, after which shipping is free.

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50167826043_f547b22f9d_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50168360941_abb9a8066f_b.jpg[/IMG]

Clarke portrait (HOF)(trimmed) 50 (SOLD)
Clarke batting (HOF) 75 (SOLD)
J. Collins (HOF) (SGC 10, but a beautiful 10, as you can see) 100 (SOLD)

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50168622582_36ab6b7d3e_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50168362086_9c4e2e72c7_b.jpg[/IMG]

Chappelle 40
Charles 30

Clark 35
J. J. Clarke 30 (SOLD)

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50168623637_6288f05618_b.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50168941927_0d864549cc_b.jpg[/IMG]

Congalton (Old Mill) 50

Chappelle and Clancy sold

Conroy sold as well

Hello I think I accidentally posted in your other thread I will take the Collins please. Thank you joe
